settings.heading: FIND A TENNIS FLEX LEAGUE NEAR YOU

settings.description: Sign up for our 3-match, flexible-format league starting December 10. Keep your game strong, win prizes, and track progress on a special holiday points race!

settings.heading: Feeling 'LUCKY'?
settings.paragrap-title: Use the code 'LUCKY' at checkout and save $5 off your flex league registration. Offer ends 11:59 PM PST, Monday, March 24, 2025.

settings.heading: Holiday Flex League Points Race
settings.subheading: It's that time of the year...
settings.description: The 2025 UTR Sports Holiday Flex League Points Race is nearly here! The points race runs from December 10,2025-January 12, 2026. There will be prizes for top performers, and the top two players will receive grand prize packages!

settings.heading: 2 Points
settings.description: Take a set against higher-rated player (not on top of the 4 points for the win)

settings.heading: The more you play, the more points you earn
Learn more about Australia Points Race
settings.bulletlist:
• Points Race ran from March 5 - May 28, 2025
  • Prizes for the top 25 finishers!
  • Grand Prize: Trip for two to the 2026 Australian Open
  • View full prize breakdown

settings.heading: Learn more about U.S. Points Race
settings.bulletlist:
• Points Race started in May 2025
  • Prizes for the top 100 finishers!
  • Grand prize: Win a trip for two (2) to a 2025 domestic ATP/WTA Pro Tennis Tournament of your choice. Includes airfare, hotel, and tournament tickets. Tournament selections include Grand Slams and ATP/WTA 1000 events.
  • View full prize breakdown

settings.heading: Compete for national glory against the best
settings.list: If you love competitive, level-based matches with flexible scheduling, now there’s even more to play for.
settings.list2: Whether you're building your game or aiming for the top, your next match could take you one step closer to national recognition at the first-ever UTR Sports Flex League National Championship.
settings.list3: Here’s how to qualify: Play in at least 3 Flex League sessions OR play at least 9 Flex League matches OR win 2 or more Flex League sessions OR finish in the Top 100 of the U.S. Flex League Points Race.
settings.list4: The road to the National Championship starts now!

settings.heading: BRING FLEX LEAGUE TENNIS TO YOUR AREA
settings.description: UTR Sports is actively looking for great people to join the team and grow flex league tennis! Become a UTR Sports Flex League Representative and grow the game.

settings.heading: Flex League Rules & Regulations
settings.description: Player commitment, fair play, and integrity are important factors for our leagues. Know what we expect from you and your opponents.

settings.heading: Flex Leagues Tennis National Championship
settings.subheading: Play your way to the top!
settings.description: The UTR Sports Flex Leagues National Championship brings together top competitors from across the country annually for one unforgettable experience of the power of level-based play! To qualify, play in at least 3 Flex League sessions OR play at least 9 Flex League matches OR win 2 or more Flex League sessions. To qualify, register for a league near you today!

settings.heading: Flex League Tennis City Championships
settings.list: Players who compete in two qualifying flex league sessions and finish in the top two of their division in at least one session will qualify to compete against opponents within the same UTR point (i.e. 4.0-4.99) to become a City Champion at their level
settings.list2: The City Championships take place twice a year, all opponents will be from the previous 4 qualifying sessions
settings.list3: Players are put into four-person brackets
settings.list4: Compete for bragging rights and memorabilia

settings.heading: For
settings.block-list-items:
• Guaranteed 4 matches over 5 weeks
  • Self-organize matches around busy schedules
  • Improve by playing competitive matches
  • Compete for playoffs and prizes
  • Challenge any player in your league

settings.heading: For
settings.block-list-items:
• New opponents and hitting partners at your level
  • Improve your UTR Rating
  • Get “match tough” with 4 matches over 5 weeks
  • Compete for playoffs and prizes
  • Challenge any player in your league

settings.heading: Elevate your Flex League tennis experience
settings.description: Save money on every UTR Sports Flex League tennis session with a Power Subscription!

settings.heading: Flex League tennis: What you need to know
settings.row_content:
• Groupings: We pair players based on UTR Ratings to create competitive matches. We’ll review all results mid-league to ensure players are getting fun, competitive matches.
  • Location: If you're outside the event area and your opponent prefers not to meet halfway, you'll need to travel to them. However, collaborating and meeting in the middle is always the best way to ensure a great match for both!
  • Prizes: Division winners who completed at least 3 matches will receive prizes for their Flex League. Prizes will be sent out via email to division winners 3 weeks after the league session is completed.
  • Challenge matches: If you're unable to reach an opponent, have scheduling issues, or want extra matches, you can challenge others in your league. After completing 2 matches in your division, use UTR Sports messenger to reach out for a challenge. If accepted, email flex@utrsports.com before the match so we can add it to the challenge draw.

settings.heading: Reminders about Playing Doubles
settings.row_content:
• Groupings: We pair players based on UTR ratings to create competitive matches. We’ll review all results mid-league and make adjustments to ensure everyone gets a fair and exciting experience.
  • Location: If you're outside the event area and your opponent prefers not to meet halfway, you'll need to travel to them. However, collaborating and meeting in the middle is always the best way to ensure a great match for both!

settings.description: Tennis is always more fun when you're matched against a variety of players. UTR Sports makes it easy to meet players I wouldn't normally play against.
settings.author: Eric Klein

settings.description: UTR Flex Leagues are the best way to play in real match conditions against meaningful competition throughout the year. The flexibility is great, and it’s nice to compete without having to sign up for a team or commit multiple days to a tournament.
settings.author: Gabe Kramer

settings.description: Flex Leagues has been a great way to work on groundstrokes in a competitive environment while still offering casual, social play.
settings.author: Maureen

settings.description: I liked the flexibility of it and was keen to see how the UTR Rating worked. The best part is meeting new people and playing with same or better players.
settings.author: Sacha Caller
settings.author-designation: Flex League Player in Melbourne, Australia

settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you on the UTR Sports app.
